about_the_game:
Evernoth A Deep Descent is a 3D psychological horror game that lets you explore interconnected mysteries within a haunting building filled with dark secrets. You’ll fight, discover mysteries, reveal hidden truths, and gain powers to navigate the darkness that engulfs the building and its twisted inhabitants.

  • As Aina, a young detective passionate about true crime, you’ll embark on an episodic journey through distorted realities and eerie liminal spaces. Each episode uncovers a new mystery, drawing you deeper into the unsettling past of the building and the lives of its lost inhabitants. You’ll solve emotional puzzles and gather fragmented memories to piece together the chilling stories hidden within its walls.

  • Prepare to confront not only the external horrors lurking in the shadows but also the psychological depths of trauma and fear. Will you uncover the truths that bind these stories, or will you be consumed by the mysteries you seek to unravel?

  • Deep Descent" is an episodic psychological horror game that invites players to explore a mysterious building filled with chilling secrets. Delve into its distorted corridors, confront twisted monsters, and solve challenging puzzles. Each episode reveals different stories from the building’s past, creating an immersive experience where discovery and horror intertwine.

  • players engage in eerie exploration and puzzle-solving within a psychological horror narrative. Navigate surreal environments, interact with haunting objects, and hide from or fight twisted monsters. As you progress, unlock unique powers and piece together fragmented memories. The episodic structure offers unique mysteries and challenges in each chapter, ensuring an atmospheric horror experience.

  • The game is divided into episodes, each focused on different mysteries tied to the building’s former inhabitants. Players will experience environments that shift between reality and the surreal, enhancing the psychological horror elements. This structure encourages exploration and investigation, where clues connect deeper stories that unravel throughout the game, keeping players immersed in its complex narrative.

content_descriptors.notes: The content of the game is not fully decided yet, but it will feature sensitive themes such as suicide, murder, and child abuse, represented through dark symbolism. The game explores topics like depression, suicide, child abuse, and non-realistic dark symbolic themes such as witchcraft and commentary on religion.

detailed_description:
Feature List


ABOUT THIS GAME

What Secrets Lurk Within the Walls of Aina’s Building?

Unravel the Mystery. Confront the Terror. Survive the Nightmare.

Dive into a gripping narrative horror experience where the lines between reality and fear blur. In The Disappearance of Arnau Rovira, you'll guide Aina as she uncovers the dark truths hidden in the fractured memories of a lost boy. Step into a sinister world shaped by Arnau’s haunting past, where every shadow whispers a story and every room hides a secret.

Psychological Horror Meets Epic Battles

Prepare to confront more than just inner demons. As Aina ventures deeper into the labyrinth of Arnau’s mind, she will face terrifying creatures born of his fear and pain. These grotesque entities, manifestations of childhood trauma, will test your wits and courage in intense, pulse-pounding battles. Armed with fragments of memory and her unyielding determination, Aina must navigate a world that bends and twists under the weight of despair.

A Building of Forgotten Stories

Explore the eerie corridors of Aina’s building—a place where time seems frozen and whispers of the past fill the air. Each chapter unravels a unique tale connected to its mysterious tenants. From shadow-filled school hallways to forests shrouded in despair, the environments transform into surreal, fractured spaces that mirror the tormented emotions of those who once lived there.

Liminal Worlds, Fractured Spaces

Reality crumbles as Aina descends further into Arnau’s memories. Endless school corridors, ominous sports fields, and haunted woods twist into impossible, dreamlike landscapes. These spaces are battlegrounds for epic encounters with horrifying creatures, where the stakes are not just survival but the reclamation of Arnau’s stolen innocence.

Narrative Exploration and Emotional Puzzles

Discover meaningful objects—a monster card, a portable console, a Walkman with recorded tapes—that reveal Arnau’s dreams, fears, and life. Each artefact brings you closer to the truth, unlocking puzzles that blend intellect and emotion. Solve these challenges to reveal fragments of Arnau’s story and piece together the events that led to his disappearance.

A Series of Mysteries Awaits

The Disappearance of Arnau Rovira is only the beginning. The Deep Descent series will take you further into the lives of those trapped in Aina’s building. Each episode presents a new, interconnected mystery—a tapestry of secrets, fear, and hope, bound by the threads of a cursed past.

Key Features:

  • Terrifying Narrative: Dive into a deeply emotional story of trauma, fear, and resilience.

  • Epic Battles: Face off against horrendous creatures in surreal, cinematic encounters.

  • Liminal Exploration: Traverse a haunting, ever-changing world where nothing is as it seems.

  • Emotional Puzzles: Solve challenges that require more than logic—empathy and insight will guide you to the truth.

  • Episodic Mystery: Each chapter unveils a new story tied to the secrets of Aina’s building.

When Aina stumbles upon an old magazine of unsolved mysteries, she’s drawn to the case of Arnau Rovira, a boy who disappeared years ago. But as she uncovers the sinister connection between the boy’s fate and her home, Aina is pulled into a harrowing journey through memories, emotions, and nightmares.

Will you uncover the truth? Or will the shadows consume you?

Wishlist The Disappearance of Arnau Rovira now and experience the horror when it launches!

name: Evernoth A Deep Descent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rtx2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rtx3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

short_description: Deep Descent is a psychological horror game where players explore a mysterious building filled with chilling secrets. Navigate distorted corridors, face terrifying monsters, and unlock unique powers. Engage in atmospheric gameplay as you unravel haunting mysteries through dark worlds.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Catalan*
*languages with full audio support
